mapper.insert: insert into question (question_id, question_type, course_name, question_content, opa, opb, opc, opd, question_answer, question_score) VALUES (#{questionId},#{questionType},#{courseName},#{questionContent},#{opa},#{opb},#{opc},#{opd}, #{questionAnswer},#{questionScore})
mapper.select: select * from question where question_type = #{type} and course_name = #{cname}
select question_score from question where question_id = #{id}

SELECT q.*,se.student_answer,se.student_score,p.question_order from paper p LEFT JOIN question q on p.question_id = q.question_id LEFT JOIN student_exam se on q.question_id = se.question_id where se.exam_id = #{examId} AND se.student_id = #{stuId} AND paper_id = #{paperId} ORDER BY p.question_order
